package.name: SimpleSky
package.description: An Adium chat style theme from the Adiumxtras site.
package.long:
It's a sky themed with a cloud image on the bottom and without buddy icons.
It comes with 3 color variants: blue, green and purple.
It has an option inside the chat window to hide the header and to switch between variants, so you don't have to go to preferences>messages to change and reopen the chat window.
To hide the header, just click on it, and to show it back, just click on the spot where it previously was, and it will fade back in.
To switch between variants, click on the cloud icon on the right side of the header.
This theme is available at http://www.adiumxtras.com/index.php?a=xtras&xtra_id=7936
